text.section: A person is guilty of permitting gambling when, having possession or control of premises which he knows are being used to advance gambling activity, he fails to halt or abate or attempt to halt or abate such use within a reasonable period of time.
Permitting gambling is a Class B misdemeanor.

law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 246, effective January 1, 1975.
